message: This is my first offer. I propose we split the money 700000 for me and 300000 for you.
I propose we split the money 450000 for me and 550000 for you. I believe this is a fair distribution considering the risk and uncertainty of future rounds.

Considering the inflation, I am proposing a new division. I will take 600000 and Bob, you will receive 400000. This maintains a reasonable balance while accounting for the diminishing value of money in subsequent rounds.
